parsed.explanation: Fixed encoding issues: replaced √ú with ü, √§ with ä, √≤ with o, √† with à, √ü with ß. Corrected XML tag errors: changed </PRICE> to </PRIZE> for consistency. Fixed book titles: "Tempe Helveticg" to "Tempe Helvetica", "Homen Hias & Odyfl." to "Homen Ilias & Odyss." (Homer's Iliad & Odyssey). Standardized format abbreviations: "4t√≤" to "4to", "8v√≤" to "8vo". Fixed missing closing tag for FORMAT in Bonds' Satyrische Gedichte entry.
